## Project Summary

This is a .NET 8 Web API backend for a personal expense tracker with MongoDB database and clean architecture.

**Technologies:**
- .NET 8 Web API
- MongoDB Driver 3.6
- JWT Bearer Authentication
- FluentValidation
- Swashbuckle (Swagger)

**Architecture:**
- Clean architecture with Domain/Services/Infrastructure separation
- JWT-based authentication with OTP
- Global exception handling
- CORS configured for frontend integration

**Key Features:**
- User authentication (OTP-based)
- Expense CRUD operations
- Dashboard analytics
- Budget tracking
- Recurring expenses
- Receipt file upload support
